title: Budget Highlights 2026 Live : FM Sitharaman outlines tax changes , high - speed corridors , and social welfare schemes in record ninth Union Budget
description: Budget Highlights 2026 live: With India set to grow above 7 percent and cross the $4 trillion GDP mark, expectations are high that the Budget will balance growth with fiscal consolidation.
